DataElement.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Decreased Comparison To Baseline Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The checkbox to indicate if a decrease in any of the parameters used to measure the mechanical function of the lungs and upper airway compared to baseline.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Decreased Comparison To Baseline Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A decrease in any of the parameters used to measure the mechanical function of the lungs and upper airway._The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A starting point to which things may be compared._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A decrease in any of the parameters used to measure the mechanical function of the lungs and upper airway.

Concepts.definition: A decrease in any of the parameters used to measure the mechanical function of the lungs and upper airway.

Property.preferredDefinition: The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:A starting point to which things may be compared.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The examination of two or more people or things in order to detect similarities and differences.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A starting point to which things may be compared.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Check this box if participant
ReferenceDocuments.description: Check this box if participant experienced no significant decline in pulmonary function test results at Week 24 compared to Baseline
